author: tbenr
content: headsup: in teku we just merged a PR which renames `--Xvalidators-suggested-fee-recipient-address` option to `--Xvalidators-proposer-default-fee-recipient`. develop dockerhub image will be automatically updated shortly. Whoever is running kintsugi node with teku , if he refreshes the docker image or rebuilds against the latest master, have to update the param accordingly. <@!199561711278227457>
